about_the_game:
In the depths of the Asteroid Jungle, one wrong move is all it takes to be caught by the enemy. Mastery of your ships systems will be necessary to survive.

Movement is simple but must be deliberate. Your engine's built in limiter will require you to wait a moment between movements. Learning the timing of this is essential in order to move at a consistent pace.

Cloaking is the base of any cloaked starship's capabilities. Unfortunately, your cloaking technology also interferes with your navigation system. It will be up to you to manually keep track of where you've been.

Torpedos are your primary weapon against the enemy. As long as you are close enough, they will always hit. But don't miss, the blast will quickly give your position away.

Mines are an indirect but equally effective weapon if used wisely. However in order to hide them from the enemy, they are also hidden from you. Remember where they are or risk tearing apart the hull of your ship against your own mines.

Radar is tricky in a fight between cloaked starships. The readings are fuzzy and unclear, but against a foe skilled at hiding, it might provide the only clues you get at the enemy's position.

Torpedos are your primary weapon against the enemy. As long as you are close enough, they will always hit. But don't miss, the blast will quickly give your position away.

name: Asteroid Jungle

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 10
  • Processor: 1.2GHz processor (Intel Core i5 and up)
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

short_description: An arcade style ship vs ship stealth battle. Find them before they find you. Destroy their ship before they destroy yours. Only skill will determine the victor.
